mapper.select:
select si.name surveyItemName, esr.result, esr.excel_row_index excelRowIndex, o.code optionCode from ent_survey_result esr inner join ent_survey_plan esp on esp.id=esr.survey_plan_id
and esp.ent_id=#{enterpriseId}
and esp.survey_item_id in ( select survey_item_id from survey_item_category where category_code=#{sheetName} and valid=1 )
and esp.valid=1 inner join survey_item si on esp.survey_item_id = si.id and si.valid = 1
inner join survey_item_category sic on sic.survey_item_id=si.id and sic.category_code=#{categoryCode} and sic.valid=1
left join (select simo.survey_item_id,sio.code,sio.option_value from survey_item_mapping_option simo inner join survey_item_option sio on simo.option_id=sio.id and sio.valid=1 where simo.valid = 1)o on (o.survey_item_id=si.id and o.option_value=esr.result) where esr.valid=1 order by si.sort_num
